remarks: Value of the map defined by ~ df-mapd at the span of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2015.)
statement:
mapdsn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdsn.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdsn.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdsn.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdsn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdsn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
mapdsn $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = { f e. F | ( O ` { X } ) C_ ( L ` f ) } ) $.
$d F f $.
$d K f $.
$d N f $.
$d W f $.
$d X f $.
$d f ph $.
